description: High Level Summary of Performance Data

targets.query: SELECT last("download_rate_mbps") AS "Download Rate" FROM "wiperf-speedtest" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "target_index" = 1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT last("upload_rate_mbps") AS "Upload Rate" FROM "wiperf-speedtest" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "target_index" = 1) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("lookup_time_ms") AS "$DNS_TARGET1" FROM "wiperf-dns" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "dns_target" =~ /^$DNS_TARGET1$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("http_server_response_time_ms") AS "${HTTP_TARGET1} - " FROM "wiperf-http" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "http_index" = '1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT last("http_server_response_time_ms") AS "${HTTP_TARGET2} -  " FROM "wiperf-http" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/ AND "http_index" = '2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET1}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=1) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET1}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=1) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET1}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=1) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET1}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=1) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "rtt_avg_ms" AS "${PING_TARGET1}" FROM "wiperf-ping" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND ("ping_index"=1) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("renewal_time_ms") AS "DHCP Renewal (mS)" FROM "wiperf-dhcp" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("network") AS "Network", last("ip") AS "IP Address", last("speedtest") AS "Speedtest", last("ping") AS "Ping Test", last("dns") AS "DNS Test", last("http") AS "HTTP Test", last("iperf_tcp") AS "TCP iperf", last("iperf_udp") AS "UDP iperf", last("dhcp") AS "DHCP Test", last("smb") AS "SMB Test", last("auth") AS "Auth Test", last("probe_mode") AS "Mode", last("mgt_if") AS "Mgt I/F", last("run_time") AS "Poll Cycle (s)" FROM "wiperf-poll-status" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$WLANPi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m)

title: 01 - Probe Summary
